GameOrchestrator - Class in org.project.Controller.Control
The GameOrchestrator class is responsible for managing the game orchestration, including players, current game state, game board, selected common goals, point assigner, tile bag, and other game-related information.
GameOrchestrator(List<Player>, GameBoard, List<CommonGoal>, PointAssigner, TileBag, Game) - Constructor for class org.project.Controller.Control.GameOrchestrator
Constructs a GameOrchestrator object with the specified players, game board, selected common goals, point assigner, tile bag, and game.
GameState - Interface in org.project.Controller.States
The GameState interface manages game states, allowing you to perform specific actions for each state and change the game state when needed.
